about.title: About Nexir
about.p1: Nexir na AI-powered brand naming studio we dem build fo founder dem, creator dem, an team dem. We e mix smart keywod analysis wit real-time domain availability, so Nexir go help yu find different, brand-ready nem dem quick — so yu kin move from idea to identity wit confidence.
about.v1: Clarity: Nexir focus pan relevance, easy fo remember, an intent — nor to endless, generic option dem.
about.v2: Originality: Fresh idea dem we nor sound random.
about.v3: Speed: Beteh option dem na seconds, nor to days.
about.ceoQuote: “Nexir na fo empower builder dem na every stage wit smart naming tool dem we e turn idea dem to clear, credible, an ownable brand — nor to friction, guesswork, or waste time.”
